info.task: navigate backwards to a switch in the off state
info.title: Navigate backwards to a switch in the off state in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterSwitch
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the switch
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the switch
testPageDocument.getElementById('afterlink').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Notifications' switch.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Notifications' switch.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
